changes.rationale: Strengthens trust through concrete auditability/observability artifacts rather than hype, ...

changes.value: Present How it Works as a 3-step horizontal stepper on desktop and vertical stepper on mob...
changes.rationale: Improves hierarchy and scannability by standardizing the interaction pattern and limiting ...

changes.value: Restructure hero into a 2-column grid on desktop (60/40): left = H1 + 3 scannable bullets ...
changes.rationale: Improves above-the-fold clarity by pairing the promise with an immediate auditability/visi...

changes.value: Convert Problem/Solution into a single before/after two-column layout on desktop and a sta...
changes.rationale: Creates a faster mental model with fewer paragraphs and a clear contrast, improving scan s...

changes.rationale: Makes pricing easier to parse by reducing table fatigue, emphasizing a default choice, and...

changes.value: Add a proof bar directly under the hero (within 24–32px): horizontally scrolling on mobile...
changes.rationale: Introduces trust signals immediately after the hero without requiring a new section, impro...

changes.value: Use 16px body text with line-height 1.5 and max line length of 65ch for improved readabili...
Implement a button hierarchy: primary buttons at 48px height with 20px padding, secondary ...
Design cards with 16px padding, subtle elevation, and a max of 2-column layout to maintain...
Introduce proof chips with a soft rounded rectangle shape and a 12px font size to convey t...
Place trust signals in a proof bar directly below the hero section with a height of 32px.
Use a calming blue shade (#4A90E2) as the primary color for buttons and highlights.
Set a light neutral background (#F7F9FC) to improve contrast and readability of content.
Use subtle dividers with a height of 1px and a color of #E0E0E0 to separate sections.

issues.description: Hero CTA placement may not be visible above fold on mobile with 2-column layout
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop grid could push CTAs below fold on mobile, killing first impression conversions

issues.description: Proof bar at 32px height insufficient for meaningful trust signals on mobile
issues.rationale: 32px barely fits one line of text, cannot accommodate logos or meaningful social proof elements

issues.description: Audit log pattern adds cognitive load without clear conversion benefit
issues.rationale: 8-10 row activity feed creates visual noise and may confuse users about what LaunchBase actually does

issues.description: 3-step horizontal stepper may not fit mobile screens without horizontal scrolling
issues.rationale: Horizontal steppers often break on narrow viewports, forcing users to scroll sideways to see all steps

issues.description: Section reordering buries pricing too deep in conversion funnel
issues.rationale: Moving pricing after audit logs delays price discovery, potentially losing price-sensitive prospects early

issues.description: Single primary CTA reduces conversion opportunities throughout page journey
issues.rationale: Users need multiple decision points; limiting CTAs to hero only ignores mid-funnel conversion moments

issues.description: 48px button height may be excessive for desktop interfaces
issues.rationale: Large buttons can look childish on desktop and consume unnecessary vertical space in forms

issues.description: 65ch max line length may be too wide for scanning on large desktop screens
issues.rationale: Optimal scanning occurs at 45-75ch but 65ch approaches the upper limit for comfortable reading

issues.description: 2-column card layout limits flexibility for different content lengths
issues.rationale: Fixed 2-column constraint may create awkward white space or force content truncation

issues.description: Proof chips at 12px may be too small for mobile tap targets and readability
issues.rationale: 12px text approaches minimum legibility threshold and falls below 44px minimum touch target guidelines

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack hero CTAs above fold on mobile at 56px height with 16px spacing, keep 2-column on desktop 1200px+
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures primary CTA visibility within first 600px viewport height across all devices

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase proof bar to 64px height on mobile, 48px desktop, allow 2-line customer quotes or logo grid
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides sufficient space for meaningful trust elements while maintaining visual hierarchy

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace audit log with simple 3-metric dashboard preview: projects launched, hours saved, success rate
suggestedFixes.rationale: Simplifies trust signal to core value props without overwhelming users with complex interface

suggestedFixes.fix: Use vertical stepper on all breakpoints, expand to horizontal only on 1024px+ with overflow handling
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures consistent experience and prevents horizontal scroll issues on tablet/mobile

suggestedFixes.fix: Move pricing before audit pattern: Hero → Proof → Problem/Solution → How it Works → Pricing → Audit
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains early price discovery while preserving trust-building sequence

suggestedFixes.fix: Add secondary CTA after pricing section and tertiary CTA in FAQ section for multi-touch conversion
suggestedFixes.rationale: Captures users at different decision stages without overwhelming initial hero experience

suggestedFixes.fix: Set primary buttons to 40px height desktop, 48px mobile with responsive padding 16-20px horizontal
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes for platform conventions while maintaining accessibility standards

suggestedFixes.fix: Set max line length to 55ch for body text with responsive adjustment down to 45ch on mobile
suggestedFixes.rationale: Improves scanning speed while maintaining readability across device sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement responsive card grid: 1 column mobile, 2 column tablet, 3 column desktop 1200px+
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides layout flexibility while maintaining visual balance across breakpoints

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase proof chips to 14px font size with 32px minimum height and 12px padding for touch targets
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures accessibility compliance and improves mobile usability while maintaining visual hierarchy
